"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5538003c636872569aaa0200#post_5538003c636872569aaa0200
Actually purified water (pure hydrogen and oxygen) is an insulator against electricity.
The micro contaminants in water (iron, zinc, sodium, etc.) are what cause conductivity.
